price: 81 A Salomon, Nous avons soumis le vent impétueux qui, par sa volonté, soufflait vers la terre que Nous avons bénie[852]. Notre science s’étend à toute chose.
arabic: وَلِسُلَيۡمَٰنَ ٱلرِّيحَ عَاصِفَةٗ تَجۡرِي بِأَمۡرِهِۦٓ إِلَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ ٱلَّتِي بَٰرَكۡنَا فِيهَاۚ وَكُنَّا بِكُلِّ شَيۡءٍ عَٰلِمِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: walisulaymāna al-rīḥa ʿāṣifatan tajrī bi-amrihi ilā al-arḍi allatī bāraknā fīhā wakunnā bikulli shayin ʿālimīna
